name: FIND THE STONES!
description:
Welcome to FIND THE STONES! a game where you need to find all the stones within 10 minutes. Try to set a high score above mine (163).

CONTROLS:

Use W/A/S/D to move around it is that simple!

A SHORT HISTORY:

FIND THE STONES! was originally planned to be made for the Pixel Weekend Jam #1  however was never finished.

HELP:

In my opinion FIND THE STONES! is a great game however if  you want to see any changes such as better graphics or better game mechanics just let me know in the comment section down below!
